thread.title: Marine Le Pen cancels Lebanon meeting over headscarf request - ITV News
thread.title_full: Marine Le Pen cancels Lebanon meeting over headscarf request - ITV News

title: Marine Le Pen cancels Lebanon meeting over headscarf request - ITV News
text:
21 February 2017 at 9:01am Marine Le Pen cancels Lebanon meeting over headscarf request Le Pen refused to wear a headscarf Credit: AP 
Marine Le Pen, who is currently running for president in France, canceled a meeting with Lebanon's Grand Mufti after refusing to wear a headscarf for the occasion. 
The far-right leader told reporters: "You can pass on my respects to the Grand Mufti, but I will not cover myself up." 
The Grand Mufti's press office said that her aides had told her prior to the meeting that they required her to wear a head covering for the meeting. 
Le Pen has been visiting Lebanon in a bid to bolster her presidential credentials. 
Polls suggest Le Pen is likely to get the highest proportion of votes in the first round of voting in April, but then lose to a more mainstream candidate in the second round in May. Last updated Tue 21 Feb 2017
